Key Match Events: Paul George scored 29 points and grabbed 10 rebounds with 3 steals.
Joël Embiid played his first game of the season against the Knicks, scoring 13 points in 26 minutes.
Donovan Mitchell scored 36 points against the Bulls at the United Center.
Cleveland Cavaliers are currently the only undefeated team in the NBA with a 12-0 record.
Pre-Game Insights: Philadelphia 76ers can become the first team to beat the undefeated Cleveland Cavaliers.
Cleveland Cavaliers are motivated to break invincibility records for the start of the season.
Joël Embiid will not play back-to-back games to preserve his body.
Tyrese Maxey is out due to injury.
Predicted starting lineup for the 76ers: Kyle Lowry, Kelly Oubre Jr, Paul George, Caleb Martin, Andre Drummond.
Predicted starting lineup for the Cavaliers: Garland, Mitchell, Okoro, Mobley, Allen.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Philadelphia 76ers are currently second to last in the Eastern Conference with 2 wins and 8 losses.
Cleveland Cavaliers are tied for 6th place in invincibility records with the 96-97 Bulls and the Seattle Supersonics.
Cleveland Cavaliers have won notable away games against the Bulls, Pelicans, Bucks, Knicks, and Wizards.
Philadelphia 76ers have a poor home record with 1 win and 4 losses.
Cleveland Cavaliers have a perfect away record with 6 wins and 0 losses.
